name: Kill Those Klowns 2!
description:
The clowns are back and clownier than ever! This time you will need to get through the Town, Funhouse, and Cemetery, before facing off with George Clownington, the president of clownville! This time there are new guns, and more tough clowns to kill!

ONCE AGAIN, ALL SOUND EFFECTS IN THIS GAME ARE RIPPED FROM THIS VIDEO:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z8pqREMESIk
